content: Third-party agencies (corporations, vocational rehab, government) provide guarantees of payment for student tuition/fees. The Bursar's Office manages domestic third parties; International Student Services manages international sponsors.
Deadlines for financial guarantee letters: without late charges—Tuition Payment Deadline; with late charges—Fall/Spring: 21st day of the semester; Summer/Winter: first day of the session.

Financial guarantee letter requirements: student name matches UA records; length of guarantee stated (≥ one semester); statement of covered charges and maximum dollar amount or percentage; U.S. billing address; cannot bill student health insurance or bookstore (students contact those units directly).

Submit guarantee letters by email to FNSV-Bursar-Third-Party@arizona.edu or mail to: The University of Arizona, Attn: Third-Party Student Liaison, 888 N. Euclid Ave. Rm. 106, Tucson, AZ 85719. To cancel, notify the Bursar's Office in writing before the first day of classes; cancellations are not accepted after classes begin unless the student pays in full.
